Package cs3500.easyanimator.model

Interface IAnimationModel

All Known Subinterfaces:
IReadOnlyModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationModelImpl, ReadOnlyModelImpl
public interface IAnimationModel
Represents an instance of a single animation that is a collection of actions performed on shapes of type IShape.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(java.lang.String key, int start, int end, IActionCommand ac)
    Adds an IActionCommand to the list of operations performed on a shape for a given amount of time.
    void addMotions​(java.lang.String name, int t1, int x1, int y1, int w1, int h1, int r1, int g1, int b1, int t2, int x2, int y2, int w2, int h2, int r2, int g2, int b2)
    Adds a transformation to the model.
    void changeCanvas​(int x, int y, int width, int height)
    Changes the canvas dimensions to the given arguments.
    void clear()
    Clears all IShape and IActionCommand from a IAnimationModel.
    void createShape​(java.lang.String name, IShape shape)
    Creates a new IShape in the model to be manipulated.
    void createShapeWithoutInstance​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
    Creates a new IShape in the model that can be manipulated via actions.
    java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<ISynchronisedActionSet>> getAnimationList()
    Returns a hashmap of the animations that are in the model for all shapes.
    int getCanvasHeight()
    Returns the canvas height for this model.
    int getCanvasWidth()
    Returns the canvas width for this model.
    int getCanvasX()
    Returns the canvas leftmost x value for this model.
    int getCanvasY()
    Returns the canvas topmost y value for this model.
    IShape getShape​(java.lang.String key)
    Returns the shape and all of its features as an IShape.
    java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​IShape> getShapeIdentifier()
    Returns a hashmap of all shapes an a given animation.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getShapeKeys()
    Returns a list of the shapes names.
    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getTicks​(java.lang.String name)
    Returns a list of ticks from a storage type that stores all of the actions of a shape as a list of ISynchronisedActionSet.
    void remove​(java.lang.String key, int startTick, int endTick)
    Removes a timeframe from a Shapes commands.
    void removeActionCommand​(java.lang.String key, int startTick, int endTick, IActionCommand ac)
    Removes an IActionCommand from a Shapes commands.
    void removeShape​(java.lang.String key)
    Removes the shape from the Map and all of its animations.

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add​(java.lang.String key, int start, int end, IActionCommand ac)
      Adds an IActionCommand to the list of operations performed on a shape for a given amount of time.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to access the shape and list of the shapes commands in a Map
      start - the start time of the given command to be performed.
      end - the end time of the given command to be performed.
      ac - the IActionCommand that will be performed on the shape.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given IActionCommand is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the shape to add the command to doesn't exist
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is another command of the same type at the same time

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears all IShape and IActionCommand from a IAnimationModel. This resets the IAnimationModel to its original state.

    • remove

      void remove​(java.lang.String key, int startTick, int endTick)
      Removes a timeframe from a Shapes commands.
      Parameters:
      key - the key that is used to erase an IActionCommand from a shapes commands.
      startTick - the start time of the IActionCommand being removed.
      endTick - the end time of the IActionCommand being removed.

    • removeActionCommand

      void removeActionCommand​(java.lang.String key, int startTick, int endTick, IActionCommand ac)
      Removes an IActionCommand from a Shapes commands.
      Parameters:
      key - the key that is used to erase an IActionCommand from a shapes commands.
      startTick - the start time of the IActionCommand being removed.
      endTick - the end time of the IActionCommand being removed.
      ac - the IActionCommand that will be removed from the list of operations.

    • createShape

      void createShape​(java.lang.String name, IShape shape) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new IShape in the model to be manipulated.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new shape.
      shape - the new shape and it's properties.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there already exists a shape with that name.

    • createShapeWithoutInstance

      void createShapeWithoutInstance​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a new IShape in the model that can be manipulated via actions. Does not require any instantiation of an IShape to be passed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      name - the unique name of the shape
      type - the type of shape based on specific keywords: 'triangle' - creates a new Triangle 'ellipse' - creates a new Oval 'rectangle' - creates a new Rectangle
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the shape name is taken

    • removeShape

      void removeShape​(java.lang.String key)
      Removes the shape from the Map and all of its animations.
      Parameters:
      key - the shapes key in the Map so that it can be accessed and removed.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the shape does not exist

    • getShapeKeys

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getShapeKeys()
      Returns a list of the shapes names.
      Returns:
      A list of the IShape in the IAnimationModel.

    • getShape

      IShape getShape​(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the shape and all of its features as an IShape.
      Parameters:
      key - the unique name of the shape
      Returns:
      the respective object of type IShape

    • changeCanvas

      void changeCanvas​(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Changes the canvas dimensions to the given arguments.
      Parameters:
      x - the leftmost x value
      y - the topmost y value
      width - the width of the canvas
      height - the height of the canvas

    • addMotions

      void addMotions​(java.lang.String name, int t1, int x1, int y1, int w1, int h1, int r1, int g1, int b1, int t2, int x2, int y2, int w2, int h2, int r2, int g2, int b2)
      Adds a transformation to the model.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the shape (added with AnimationBuilder.declareShape(java.lang.String, java.lang.String))
      t1 - The start time of this transformation
      x1 - The initial x-position of the shape
      y1 - The initial y-position of the shape
      w1 - The initial width of the shape
      h1 - The initial height of the shape
      r1 - The initial red color-value of the shape
      g1 - The initial green color-value of the shape
      b1 - The initial blue color-value of the shape
      t2 - The end time of this transformation
      x2 - The final x-position of the shape
      y2 - The final y-position of the shape
      w2 - The final width of the shape
      h2 - The final height of the shape
      r2 - The final red color-value of the shape
      g2 - The final green color-value of the shape
      b2 - The final blue color-value of the shape

    • getTicks

      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getTicks​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns a list of ticks from a storage type that stores all of the actions of a shape as a list of ISynchronisedActionSet.
      Parameters:
      name - the unique name of the shape
      Returns:
      a list of integers of all of the ticks where the shape has a defined instance/frame

    • getAnimationList

      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<ISynchronisedActionSet>> getAnimationList()
      Returns a hashmap of the animations that are in the model for all shapes.
      Returns:
      hashmap of the animations that are in the model for all shapes.

    • getShapeIdentifier

      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,​IShape> getShapeIdentifier()
      Returns a hashmap of all shapes an a given animation.
      Returns:
      hashmap of all of the shapes and their names.

    • getCanvasWidth

      int getCanvasWidth()
      Returns the canvas width for this model.
      Returns:
      returns the canvas width as an int.

    • getCanvasHeight

      int getCanvasHeight()
      Returns the canvas height for this model.
      Returns:
      the canvas height as an int.

    • getCanvasX

      int getCanvasX()
      Returns the canvas leftmost x value for this model.
      Returns:
      returns the leftmost x value of the canvas as an int.

    • getCanvasY

      int getCanvasY()
      Returns the canvas topmost y value for this model.
      Returns:
      the topmost y value canvas height as an int.
